fulltext:
TRAN KIM THOA
UI/UX PRODUCT DESIGNER
l am the Ux/UI product designer.
| was born on March 14th, 1984 in Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam.
Starting working with multigraphic designs serve for Marketing
Dept. and Branding ldentify .
I found myself by each project with love, passionate, competitive,
constancy and explore creative way, especially through several long
term UX design projects of website and applications in few months.
5 years experience at designer position and over 2 years at UI/UX
product designing position in Software Dept, its not very strong
background but I had been trained very good many skills in my
major, solving problem or manage teamwork. I learnt them in field
sources as university, companies-courses, the upper managers and
from my failures, too.
PROFILE
I have studied in Arena Multimedia University,
EDUCATION
FPT on 2012
My major is Graphic design suite for website, applications on mobile, anima-
tion, video & design products related with printing industry.
Illustrator in graphic / Multimedia & Advertising Field
SKILLS
Photoshop
Illustrator
Dreamweaver
Sketch storyboarb
Illustrator in UI/ux website / Application & Software Field
Dreamweaver/NotepadPlus
HTML5
CSS
Illustrator in management / Management Field
Timing
Dealine Task/Project
People
Solving problem
Analysis
Predict Risk
Quality
Software project management
UI/UX PRODUCT DESIGNER
Dicentral
Present - From Sep 2017
DiCentral is a leading global provider of EDI and supply chain solutions
headquartered in Houston, Texas, with 10 offices worldwide supporting
customers across multiple sectors in over 35 countries.
Ihave responsible:
Layout website and application on website & mobile.
Customize user experience lets more easier to interactively using by
user's habits, new trend colour, buttons, navigation menu, display
content, tables, pop up ...
Supproting front end team, BA, developer programmer even PO.
Work with marketing team to develop products with Microsoft partner or
someone else by video, clips and event designing relevant.
Brainstorm with team to improve products' brand and tailored them
more effective by stronger tools
Develop idea or document request from BA/PO into graphic simple
interactive and respond them my opinion in need.
Achievements:
Build DiMed interface, application website of Steward Hospital group in
US.
Modify user interface DiAutomotive, the application of serving logistics
Supporting to improve new interface for SmartTurn, DiwMS applications,
the app provide to manage warehouse for wholesale, logistic, warehouse.
3PL and some other industries..
Besides that i have tailored new user interface for DiMetric as well, the
application web for creating roles, people, contact list to link between
other applications on DiCentral-EDI system.
Vu Thao Computer
Present - From Oct 2016
Vu Thao Computer is the one of first company design Project Manage-
ment applications, develop from Sitepoint, a software of Microsoft.
Lhave responsible:
Layout website and application on website & mobile.
eC
Communication with clients to deal best product solution.
eS
Support CSS team in HTML and CSS on front end.
Design products insight to develop Vu Thao brand.
Manage my project by management software which product Vu thao
developing.
Achievements:
eA
Achieve the goal of making the web better, lasted technology and intuition
eN
Manage risks, issue or analysis Ux when client run our applications.
PROFESIONAL
EXPERIENCE
Customize user expe-
rience lets more
easier to interactively
using by user' shabits,
new trend colour,
buttons, navigation
menusislayconten
tables, pop up ...
UI/UX MAPSTYLE & BRAND - DESIGN LEADER
Wonav Corp
From Dec 2015 - Sep 2016
They designed and developed the mapstyle to commercial B2C by GIS
platform.
Ihave responsible:
* Work with developers to build the style of map in HTML.
Design sale kits to advertise insight the Wonav brand on social medias
through posts , mini game or small campaigns.
Achievements:
Learn skill on collection data from GIs flatform and how to build mapstyle.
Built a part of website.
Manage team work out smoothly and effective when campaign is lauch-
ing, get more potential clients to contact us.
UI/UXWEBSITE & APPLICATION - LEADER DESIGNER
Mivisions International
From Aug 2015 - Nov 2015
The company is focus on the client's critical needs including targets and
desired growth rate in their market of choice as consulting of education
and staff, IT support ..B2C and B2B as well.
Ihave responsible:
Design commercial website is market place site.
Manage design stuff for brand identify.
Manage team to prepare materials to support Marketing Dept for educa-
tion campaign, workshop,..
Achievements:
Knowledge what workflow in education field.
Knowledge what trend and sense of European and their habit also.
PROFESIONAL
EXPERIENCE
SENIOR GRAPHIC DESIGN
The Al Frescos Group, Viet Nam Branch
From Jan 2012 to Aug 2015
Their business in F & Bindustry, very popular and famous with pizza and
BBQ rib. There have over 10 restaurants in HCMC and over 20 in Ha Noi
City, some in Da Nang, also arround 800 staff during Viet Nam.
have responsible:
Designing stuff
Design almost kinds of menu, new layout event.
Design a master page through South, Middle and North then designers
per each area will apply multimedia (menu, poster, flier, standee, mock
up, cap, polos, vouchers...
Responsible maintain, develop identify brands through all designs: colour,
image, uniform, font style and culture company
Take photos of food for special menu, main menu, website, event, party
Management campaign, partner support and dealine stuf as supervisor
Planning and organize design stuff when have new promotion / deal / flier
/ campaign.
Work out and follow up costing, process with supplier
Liaise with marketing team, social media team, data system team, web
server, outlets to update, pop up all new in same time
Achievements:
Effectively manage the workflow and dealine in short time even other
project/task/people cross.
Fexible make decision when trouble happen suddenly.
Analysis risk appear at the beginning start project/campaign...
Thank you for reading!
If you want to collaborate on crafting amazing experience
for people - you are very welcome to contact me.
Tran Kim Thoa
0902.472.199 - hcm.kimthoa@gmail.com
PROFESIONAL
EXPERIENCE
